original: 15.33. Sāsavaduka, Kusalattika🔽Sāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sāsavaduka kusalattika  sa āsavam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: The Chapter on the Triad with Obstructions🔽With an object that has an obstruction and is wholesome as condition there arises an object that has no obstruction and is not wholesome. A condition by way of root cause condition.

original: Anāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
analyzed: anāsavam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With an object that has no obstruction and is wholesome as condition there arises an object that has no obstruction and is not wholesome. A condition by way of root cause condition.
By way of root cause two, … by way of non-adverting two.

original: Sāsavaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: sa āsavam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na anāsavaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With an object that has an obstruction and is unwholesome as condition there arises an object that has no obstruction and is not unwholesome. By way of root cause one, … by way of non-adverting one.

original: Sāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasāsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: sa āsavam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na sa āsavaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe avigate dve
translated: With an object that has an obstruction and is indeterminate as condition there arises an object that has no obstruction and is indeterminate. A condition by way of root cause condition. By way of root cause two, … by way of non-adverting two.
